metadata.title: CVE-2024-56827 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in the OpenJPEG project. A heap buffer overflow conditionmay be triggered when certain options are specified while using theopj_decompress utility.  This can lead to an application crash or otherundefined behavior.

criterions.comment: openjpeg2 package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
insighttoolkit4 package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
blender package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
texmaker package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
ghostscript package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
openjpeg package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
